bibl.title: P. Col. inv. 131 Recto: A Loan Contract with Paramonê Provision from Mid-first-century CE Theadelphia.
bibl.note: Theadelphia, 20 August 58 CE. On the back of the papyrus we find an account (whose publication is forthcoming), probably of expenses, by a phrontistês from Philadelphia.
bibl.seg: Yiftach-Firanko Uri, P. Col. inv. 131 Recto: A Loan Contract with Paramonê Provision from Mid-first-century CE Theadelphia.
Theadelphia, 20 August 58 CE. On the back of the papyrus we find an account (whose publication is forthcoming), probably of expenses, by a phrontistês from Philadelphia.
